Sept. 24, 1978 D Buxton Entertainment Contest
Buxton Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
buxton-entertainment-contest
None
Octagon Theatre, Pavilion Gardens, Buxton Best cornet - Chris Jones (Burbage) Best soloist - Gwyn Edwards (cornet) Colwyn Borough. Prizes - 1st £80 and shield, 2nd £55 and cup, 3rd £30, 9 bands competed. 7th annual contest.
Dec. 6, 2014, 7:48 a.m. Dec. 19, 2016, 11:46 p.m.
